description:
Zeph is an interesting guy. Crazy tattoos, military guy (hefty scar from an Iraq bomb) and a big ole piece of meat.
He's also got a thing for cock and ball torture, pain, and subjugation. He's telling me this after his solo (online in a week or two) and the whole time I am thinking "mmmmmmm 'Edge' dude". And it wasn't just his fetishes that intrigued me, I really wanted to suck that dick of his! I have a bit of domineering streak, and the chance to get this dude on my leash was just too good to pass up.
I lengthened some of the fantasy sequences, and am not sure I like it. I like the quicker flashes, but thought I might extend them to see how it flows.
We dipped in to some fetish activities. Our boy Zeph loves them all, and though I don't want too go to deeply in to any one fetish, but this vid touches on a few.
His cumshot is amazing, even shooting on the wall behind him. I had to repaint the entire wall, cuz it was all over the place! He looks like a fire hose flailing about from output pressure!
Enjoy!
title: Bryan & Zeph - Edge
